titles: Tyrants and protectors set forth in their colours. Or, The difference between good and bad magistrates; in several characters, instances and examples of both. / By J.P.
author: Price, John, Citizen of London.
publisher: Printed for H. Cripps and L. Lloyd, and are to be sold at their shop in Popes-head Alley.,
notes: J.P. = John Price, an anagram of whose name ("Cri in hope") appears on E1v.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Kings and rulers --  Early works to 1800.
